body_html:
I can confirm it's a bug of Eigen.
Such error will be raised while compiling Eigen (commit) with cmake .. -DEIGEN_TEST_CUDA=ON && make check -j4:

In file included from /home/ubuntu/eigen-eigen-5c43a259f0b5/Eigen/QR:11:0,
                 from /home/ubuntu/eigen-eigen-5c43a259f0b5/test/main.h:272,
                 from /home/ubuntu/eigen-eigen-5c43a259f0b5/test/cuda_basic.cu:23:
/home/ubuntu/eigen-eigen-5c43a259f0b5/Eigen/Core:59:34: fatal error: math_functions.hpp: No such file or directory
body:
I can confirm it's a bug of [Eigen](http://eigen.tuxfamily.org/).
Such error will be raised while compiling Eigen ([commit](https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/src/5c43a259f0b51963a00dd85e941a1fd044ac1cf4)) with `cmake .. -DEIGEN_TEST_CUDA=ON && make check -j4`:
```
In file included from /home/ubuntu/eigen-eigen-5c43a259f0b5/Eigen/QR:11:0,
                 from /home/ubuntu/eigen-eigen-5c43a259f0b5/test/main.h:272,
                 from /home/ubuntu/eigen-eigen-5c43a259f0b5/test/cuda_basic.cu:23:
/home/ubuntu/eigen-eigen-5c43a259f0b5/Eigen/Core:59:34: fatal error: math_functions.hpp: No such file or directory
```
